lines.text: Why is my life so much harder than everybody else's?
Better a Redfish than a Deadfish.
Everything works if you let it.

[to Travis]
Well that's a strange and wondrous tale, son, but like everything else, it'll work if you let it.
Uh oh. Travis has a brainlock.
The musicians make it rock, but the roadies make it roll!
Got it! Redfish Salvage. Everything works if you let it.

[using the remote to shut off the large number of TVs he is constantly watching]
Never did like TV.
